Work

Hey, I’m Justin

I’m a product and design strategist for web and mobile experiences. 
Say “hey” back at justin@jbarr.co

I’m a design-driven product manager that specializes in translating complex domains into friendly user experiences for startups and enterprise companies alike.

Currently, I’m a Product and Design Lead at Signal Sciences, a cybersecurity startup protecting apps and servers from hacking and other malicious traffic. Previously, I was a Product Designer at Carbon Five (a design and development agency), and a UX Architect at Media Temple in Los Angeles.

I’ve written, talked, and presented on subjects such as Agile design, chatbots, UX sketching, and working as a UX team of one.

See my work →

Scroll to top ↑

Info

Justin Barr Young is a product expert pushing pixels and code in sunny Los Angeles. For over a decade, he's been working, learning, and mentoring in the sweet spot where design thinking, technology, and business meet. When he's away from the computer, he's riding his bike, reading nonfiction, or sampling local beers.

He built this site using LESS, Jekyll, CodeKit, and parts of Novastrap by @itsmeara.
